meta.name: tesla-comments-seed
meta.note: Curated high-signal X comments with Chinese translation

1975516996134723818.author: Whole Mars Catalog
1975516996134723818.text_en: Tested on downtown SF this morning. Unprotected lefts are way smoother than 14.0, still hesitant at blind crest intersections.
1975516996134723818.text_zh: 今天早上在旧金山市中心实测。无保护左转比14.0顺滑很多，但在盲坡路口仍然偏保守。

1975516996134723818.author: Sawyer Merritt
1975516996134723818.text_en: Nice progress. Biggest question is intervention rate in rain/night mix. Any internal numbers you can share later?
1975516996134723818.text_zh: 进步不错。最大问题是雨夜混合场景的接管率，后续能分享内部指标吗？

1975516996134723818.author: Dirty Tesla
1975516996134723818.text_en: Merge behavior is finally human-like on Michigan freeways. It commits earlier and avoids the late-swerve feel from prior builds.
1975516996134723818.text_zh: 在密歇根高速上的并线终于更像人类驾驶：更早决策，减少了旧版本那种最后一刻急切变道。

1975516996134723818.author: Ashok Elluswamy
1975516996134723818.text_en: We focused this release on planner consistency and reducing edge-case jerk. Parking lot stack will get another pass soon.
1975516996134723818.text_zh: 这个版本重点优化规划器一致性并降低边缘场景抖动。停车场能力很快会再做一轮强化。

1975516996134723818.author: Omar Qazi
1975516996134723818.text_en: 14.1 is less dramatic but more reliable. That is exactly what unlocks trust and paid conversion.
1975516996134723818.text_zh: 14.1 的变化没那么“惊艳”，但可靠性明显更高。这才是提升信任和付费转化的关键。

1975516996134723818.author: Tesla Owners Silicon Valley
1975516996134723818.text_en: Community feedback: lane choice in complex exits improved, but construction zones still need conservative fallback.
1975516996134723818.text_zh: 社区反馈：复杂匝道出口选道进步明显，但施工路段仍需更保守的降级策略。

1975516996134723818.author: James Douma
1975516996134723818.text_en: This looks like a net architecture cleanup cycle. Throughput matters less than deterministic behavior for robotaxi readiness.
1975516996134723818.text_zh: 看起来这是一次网络架构“清理周期”。对Robotaxi准备度而言，吞吐提升不如确定性行为重要。

1975516996134723818.author: Adri
1975516996134723818.text_en: Please expose scenario-level changelog in-app. Drivers need to know what actually changed before each update.
1975516996134723818.text_zh: 建议在车机内提供“场景级更新日志”，用户需要在每次更新前知道到底改了什么。
